mapper.select: select a.plan_no as planNo, a.ord_sht_no as ordShtNo, to_char(a.due_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as dueDate, a.work_prot as workPort, to_char(a.plan_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as planDate , b.prd_cd as prdCd , b.prc_cd as prcCd ,(select prd_nm from adm_prd where prd_cd=b.prd_cd) prd_nm, b.need_cnt as needCnt, b.instr_cnt as instrCnt , to_char(b.work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as workStrDate, b.work_plan_time as workStrTime,b.line_no as lineNo from pdt_plan a join pdt_plan_dtl b on(a.plan_no = b.plan_no) where a.plan_no=#{planVo} and to_date(work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select instr_no , plan_no , work_prot , to_char(instr_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') instr_date , to_char(pdt_fin_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') pdt_fin_date , (case when now_phs='Y' then '공정진행' else '미진행' end) now_phs from pdt_work_instr where 1=1
and now_phs ='Y'
and now_phs ='N'
and instr_date>=#{startDate}
and #{endDate}>=instr_date

select a.* , b.* from (select instr_no, line_no , prd_cd , instr_cnt , pdt_cnt , to_char(work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') work_str_date, work_str_time , bom_cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl group by instr_no, line_no , prd_cd , instr_cnt , pdt_cnt , work_str_date , work_str_time , bom_cd having 1=1) a join pdt_work_instr b on a.instr_no = b.instr_no where 1=1
and instr_no like'%'||#{instrNo}||'%'
and prd_cd like '%'||#{prdCd}||'%'
and a.work_str_date>=#{startDate}
and #{endDate}>=a.work_str_date
and now_phs = 'Y'
and now_phs = 'N'

select instr_no, line_no , prd_cd , instr_cnt , pdt_cnt , to_char(work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') work_str_date , work_str_time , bom_cd ,prc_cd from pdt_work_instr_dtl where line_no=#{lineNo} AND instr_no=#{instrNo}

select DISTINCT * from ((select a.plan_no , a.ord_sht_no , to_char(a.due_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as due_date , a.work_prot , to_char(a.plan_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') plan_date , a.now_phs ,to_char(b.work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') from pdt_plan a join pdt_plan_dtl b on a.plan_no=b.plan_no where to_date(b.work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) a left join (select * from pdt_work_instr where to_date(instr_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')=to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) b on a.plan_no = b.plan_no where 1=1
and b.instr_no is not null
and b.instr_no is null

select a.mtr_lot as mtrLot , b.in_no as inNo , b.mtr_cd as mtrCd , b.hld_cnt as hldCnt , b.stck_cnt as stckCnt from used_mtr_lot a join mtr_lot_stck b on a.mtr_lot = b. mtr_lot where a.instr_dtl_no =#{planDtlNo}
mapper.insert: insert into pdt_work_instr (instr_no , plan_no , work_prot, instr_date , now_phs) values (PKG_MAKE_CODE.CODE('PWO','pdt_work_instr','instr_no'),#{planNo},#{workProt},to_date(#{instrDate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') ,'N')

insert into pdt_work_instr_dtl (line_no, instr_no, prd_cd,prc_cd ,pdt_cnt, instr_cnt , work_str_date ) values (#{lineNo},#{instrNo},#{prdCd},#{prcCd},#{instrCnt},#{needCnt}, to_date(#{workStrDate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select max(to_char(work_str_date,'yyyy-MM-dd')) workStrDate from pdt_plan_dtl where plan_no =#{planNo}
